alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 21 at 11:30AM CDT until May 23 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River at Lisbon affecting Ransom County. Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94) affecting Cass County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Halstad affecting Norman and Traill Counties. Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo affecting Cass County. Sheyenne River at Harwood affecting Cass County. Sheyenne River near Kindred affecting Richland and Cass Counties. .Moderate to major flooding continues along the Sheyenne River near the mainstem Red River. Elsewhere, minor flooding is currently observed. Water levels will remain steady or gradually decrease. Forecasts include observed precipitation as well as expected precipitation over the next 24 hours. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94). * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 18.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 AM CDT Saturday was 18.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
